Text: You can use the .Cue files to split the tracks. Search for Medievil Cue Splitter for a decent cue splitting program for windows OS, Im not too sure if it works on mac or linux, someone else will have to confirm that.

and @ XxXDoWNLoADeRXxX, Hardstyle is NOT, and repeat NOT hard trance :D 2 compleatly different things :) all different bass and melody samples to start with..

WOW! that song is fucking epic

and @jerma88 Check out Deepforce's "Harder". It's hard trance, but it sounds just like hardstyle. I didn't said that Hardstyle was Hard Trance, because it isn't. It just sound very simmilar. They both share the awesome bass.

@ XxXDoWNLoADeRXxX, you're right, they have their similarities in Rithem and Melody :) you can twist and bitch but they are both brilliant :D but prefere hardstyle, just harder in the Bass :D and sorry if i sounded like an ass.. was just super exited with this album :D
